title: Inbox Feature Flagging  [iOS < 11.7.0, ANDROID >= 10.1.0]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has Ballpark app installed and is logged in

UPDATED TEST NOTES - 10/17/2022:
*enable_inbox is no longer used for iOS 11.7.0 [BP-9783](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9783)
*More tab showing Profile/Inbox icon was removed with [BPA-6398](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6398) / [BP-9676](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9676)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Inbox Feature is turned off (i.e. enable_inbox is disabled in Remote Config)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User will not have the ability to view Inbox (i.e. There will be no icon shown on Home/More Tab)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Inbox Feature is turned on (i.e. enable_inbox is enabled in Remote Config)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User will have the ability to view Inbox (i.e. There will be an icon shown on Home/More Tab)

title: Inbox Message List
custom_preconds:
GIVEN  Inbox feature is enabled* 
AND User has Ballpark app installed 
AND User is logged in


*Inbox Feature Flagging available for iOS < 11.7.0 
*Inbox Feature Flagging available for ANDROID >= 10.1.0

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user clicks on Inbox Icon in HomePage/MyProfile 
AND user has no messages
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Inbox empty screen will be presented

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user clicks on Inbox Icon in HomePage/MyProfile 
AND user has messages
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN list of messages will be presented

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN list of messages is presented
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN each message will be in the list
AND each entry in the list will have a subject, sender & body preview and a date received

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN list of messages is presented with at least one unread message

(if needing a new unread message, it can be sent to account via Club Tools - Notifications Manager
https://qa-clubtools.us-central1.mobiletools-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/notifications )
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN each unread entry in the list will have the Sender and subject text bold

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN list of messages is presented with at least one read message
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN each previously read entry in the list will have the Sender and subject text NOT bold

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on a message in the list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a screen with details of that message will be presented

title: Inbox Message Details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Inbox feature is enabled*
AND User has Ballpark app installed
AND User is logged in
AND user has at least one message in the list of messages

*Inbox Feature Flagging available for iOS < 11.7.0
*Inbox Feature Flagging available for ANDROID >= 10.1.0

(if needing a new message in a specific state, it can be sent to account via Club Tools - Notifications Manager
https://qa-clubtools.us-central1.mobiletools-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/notifications )

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on message in the list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a screen with details of the message is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the screen of message details is presented which has no icon url nor action url
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN screen will be presented which contains the message's sender, subject, and message.  The message icon will be the placeholder / default value (gray mlb logo).  There will be no action button shown.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the screen of message details is presented which has an icon url
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN screen will be presented and message icon will be the value specified (i.e. "https://storage.mobile.mlbinfra.com/bplogos/2020/115@3x.png")

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the screen of message details is presented which has action text and url
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a button will be displayed labeled with action text and when clicked will navigate to the destination of the action url (i.e.           "ballpark://wallet", "http://www.google.com", etc.)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the screen of message details is presented and user returns to Message list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the status of the message will be read

title: Inbox Has Unread Messages
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in and has an unread message in their inbox (can be verified by looking at the inbox documents filtered by the users otkaID and seeing one has a status of "unread")


(if needing a new message in a specific state, it can be sent to account via Club Tools - Notifications Manager
https://qa-clubtools.us-central1.mobiletools-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/notifications )
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Home Tab
custom_expected: THEN the Inbox icon will have an indicator dot in the top right that is Ballpark blue when any favorite team is specified, as well as no favorite team specified. (Ballpark 10.1.0 requirement)
